column1: eneth is a noun meaning "name" in Sindarin.
The etymology of this word is obscure. It is unknown if it contains any Sundocarmë related to the Quenya word Essë.
Note that the verb "to name" in Sindarin is esta-.
* http://www.jrrvf.com/hisweloke/sindar/online/sindar/dict-sd-en.html Hiswelókës Sindarin Dictionary compiled by Didier Willis
